headline: KKR, PSP Investments Partner to Buy Stake in Two American Electric Power Companies
summary: KKR is partnering with the Public Sector Pension Investment Board to buy a 19.9% interest in two units of American Electric Power for $2.82 billion.

raw.headline: KKR, PSP Investments Partner to Buy Stake in Two American Electric Power Companies
raw.summary: KKR is partnering with the Public Sector Pension Investment Board to buy a 19.9% interest in two units of American Electric Power for $2.82 billion.

headline: AEP Secures Minority Equity Interest Investment in Ohio and Indiana & Michigan Transmission Companies
summary: American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) today announced a definitive agreement for a strategic partnership between KKR and PSP Investments to acquire a 19.9% equity interest in the company's Ohio and Indiana & Michigan Transmission Companies (Transcos) for $2.82 billion. The Transcos are transmission-only, Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) regulated utilities that build, own and operate transmission infrastructure.

The Transcos are transmission-only, Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) regulated utilities that build, own and operate transmission infrastructure.
